about_the_game:
Stat Boost Pack : Experience and gold obtained from battle and adventure are increased by an additional 20%, and each 10 items that permanently increases 12 types of battle-related stats.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item.
detailed_description:
Stat Boost Pack : Experience and gold obtained from battle and adventure are increased by an additional 20%, and each 10 items that permanently increases 12 types of battle-related stats.
Click the Receive button in Shop -> DLC in the game to receive the item.
